title: t204 clark Griffith Blank back SGC auth
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: t204 clark Griffith Blank back SGC auth
posts.post_content:
very nice looking T204 blank back hofer graded SGC A. Has a bit of paper spotting on the front, otherwise ex condition card. Possibly one of a kind $225  OBO shipped or will trade for stuff on my wantlist:

M116 Evers or Tinker or any blank backs

T202 - Cobb, Matty, Speaker

Unique Hal Chase cards

Presentable Turkey red hofer

M101-4 Cubs

BF2 Cubs

signed 1933 Goudey

Thanks!

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=68133&d=1341542872[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=68134&d=1341542885[/IMG]

That's a VERY nice card Sean.  Too bad that I'm not much into the T204 series or I would have been all over it.

Best,
Scott
Sean, I will take it for $225.  Please pm your paypal info.
